懲.definition: to punish; to reprimand; to warn

懲一儆百.definition: lit. punish one to warn one hundred (idiom); fig. to make an example of sb

懲一警百.definition: lit. punish one, warn one hundred (idiom); fig. to make an example of sb; also written 懲一儆百|惩一儆百[cheng2 yi1 jing3 bai3]

懲前毖後.definition: lit. to punish those before to prevent those after (idiom); to criticize former mistakes firmly to prevent them happening again

懲惡勸善.definition: see 懲惡揚善|惩恶扬善[cheng2 e4 yang2 shan4]

懲惡揚善.definition: to uphold virtue and condemn evil (idiom)

懲辦.definition: to punish (someone); to take disciplinary action against (someone)
